backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing departments, semesters, subjects, resources, user profiles, and admin‑gated CRUD with blob storage and migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Data‑migration module converting old resource structures with URLs into the new resource format that supports URL or external blob content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing layout, components, pages, and catalog utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, radius values, and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Component enforcing authentication and admin checks before rendering admin content with appropriate UI states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHelpS: Static admin help card explaining two ways to add study materials and organization tips.
frontend/src/components/admin/Department: UI for managing departments and subjects with dialogs for add, edit, and delete operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResourceMa: Admin interface to add, edit, and delete study resources with support for URL and file uploads.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing copyright, attribution, and external link with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Top navigation bar with branding, navigation links, login, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/resources/EmptyS: Reusable empty-state card showing an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Filter panel for resources supporting keyword, department, semester, subject, and type selection.
Renders a list of resources with type badges, optional context labels, and open buttons linking to URLs or blob files.
frontend/src/features/admin/resourceMuta: Defines React Query mutations for adding, editing, and removing resources through the backend actor and invalidates department queries.
frontend/src/features/admin/structureMut: Provides mutations to manage departments and subjects via the actor API and refreshes department data on success.
frontend/src/features/admin/useAdminStat: Queries whether the current authenticated user is an admin using the actor's isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSea: Implements filtering logic for resources based on keyword, structure IDs, and derived resource type.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: Fetches all departments from the backend using React Query and the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context, login handling, identity loading, and state management for Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light/dark modes with an academic color palette.
frontend/src/lib/resourceType.ts: Derives a resource type from its title or URL using keyword checks and returns a categorized label.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface with tabs for managing resources and academic structure, protected by an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: A browsing UI for departments, semesters, and subjects, handling loading states and navigation to subject resources.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and feature cards, linking to browse and search routes.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Search interface that flattens all resources, applies filters, and displays results or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Displays a specific subject’s resources with breadcrumbs and handles missing data or empty resource lists.
frontend/src/utils/semesterSort.ts: Utility to sort semesters by extracted numeric value with string fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and animations with plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, and known issues for the PREMJI study‑materials website. Includes metadata, feature list, and a reported search‑button UI error.
